menu.label: Publications
menu.title: Publications
menu.description: A collection of my research papers and articles.

publis.title: Migration Dynamics in Brazil
publis.full_title: Migration Dynamics in Brazil: A Spatial Econometric Analysis
publis.excerpt: A Master's thesis on migration dynamics in Brazil and abroad, with an emphasis on the economic factors that drive people to relocate.
publis.content: This tutorial covers abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc abcabc

publis.title: Knowledge Spillovers Across Micro-Regions of Brazil
publis.excerpt: Meet Wilhelm, your AI Econometrics Professor! This digital book provides comprehensive econometrics lessons, enhanced by an interactive AI agent designed to guide you through complex concepts and help you learn.

publis.title: Export complexity, industrial complexity and regional economic growth in Brazil
publis.excerpt: A comparison of various complexity (ECI) metrics with Brazilian exports and employment data.

publis.title: Notes on the Census Microdata
publis.excerpt: With his Census background, Guilherme illustrates a streamlined method for accessing IBGE's census data via Bash and GCP.

publis.title: Geographic Normalization
publis.excerpt: Geographic Normalization can transform complex, irregular polygons into standardized hexagonal grids, and understand the far-reaching implications of this approach for spatial analysis.

publis.title: Money Neutrality in the Covid19 Era
publis.excerpt: Based on economic models, the idea of money neutrality is explained in an animated way. Guilherme rightly predicts inflation in the medium term, as expansionary monetary policies were applied to mitigate the Covid effects. In the long term, 'inflation is nothing but a monetary phenomenon'.

publis.title: Socioeconomic Observatory of Santa Catarina
publis.excerpt: A dashboard to analyze and forecast time series of Brazilian socio-economic data, with focus on the state of Santa Catarina.

layers.desc1_floripa: Where I have lived most of my life, where I grow up and started working.
layers.desc2_floripa: Florian√≥polis is a city in southern Brazil known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and outdoor activities. It's a popular destination for both tourists and locals.
layers.desc1_dublin: Where I have matured, spent one year in the island studying business administration and English langugage to prepare myself for the challenges to come.
layers.desc2_dublin: Dublin is the capital of Ireland, famous for its rich history, literary heritage, and friendly atmosphere. It's a hub for technology and finance in Europe.
layers.desc1_lisbon: Where I continued working in IT and got back in touch with my roots, keep good memories from this place :)
layers.desc2_lisbon: Lisbon is the capital of Portugal, known for its stunning architecture, historic neighborhoods, and vibrant nightlife. It's a city that blends tradition with modernity.
layers.desc1_munster: Where I did my Masters and aim to persue a Senior carrer.
layers.desc2_munster: M√ºnster is a city in Germany known for its historic old town, university, and cycling culture. It's a charming city with a rich history and vibrant student life.

aiagents.title: Tom Riddle's Diary
aiagents.excerpt: A tutorial on visualizing geospatial data using the Leaflet JavaScript library.
aiagents.content: This post dives into using Leaflet to create interactive maps for geospatial data visualization. Topics include setting up a Leaflet map, adding markers, layers, and popups, and integrating with geospatial datasets. The tutorial includes a step-by-step guide to building a city temperature heatmap.

Topics include setting up a Leaflet map, adding markers, layers, and popups, and integrating with geospatial datasets. The tutorial includes a step-by-step guide to building a city temperature heatmap.

posts.title: Solar Terminator
posts.excerpt: The solar terminator shows the moving line dividing Earth's day and night sides as it rotates.

menu.label: About
menu.title: Guilherme Viegas
menu.tagline: Data Scientist | Geospatial Analyst | AI Enthusiast
menu.description: I transform complex data into actionable insights through advanced analytics and machine learning. With expertise in econometrics and spatial analysis, I build solutions that help organizations make data-driven decisions. My approach combines technical rigor with clear communication to bridge the gap between data science and business strategy.

sections.title: Methodological Approach
sections.content: My work follows a rigorous analytical process: 1) Problem framing with stakeholders, 2) Exploratory data analysis, 3) Model development with validation, 4) Implementation strategy, and 5) Continuous monitoring. I emphasize reproducibility through version control and documentation, ensuring insights stand up to scrutiny.
